metadata.title: CVE-2016-3745 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple buffer overflows in mediaserver in Android 4.x before 4.4.4, 5.0.xbefore 5.0.2, 5.1.x before 5.1.1, and 6.x before 2016-07-01 allow attackersto gain privileges via a crafted application that provides an AudioEffectreply, as demonstrated by obtaining Signature or SignatureOrSystem access,aka internal bug 28173666.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
